placeInfo.headerSubTitle: Indiaâ€™s largest exhibition on Interiors, Architecture & Design
placeInfo.title: INDEX Fair Mumbai
placeInfo.Highlights: A sourcing platform for new products, designs and inspiring ideas ,Boasts an international array of brands and exhibitors,Has earned enormous goodwill over the years due to its commanding presence in the sector
placeInfo.description: INDEX is a leading international trade fair and a leading interior design exhibition in India, and also the countryâ€™s largest focused commercial platform on interiors, architecture, materials, and design, which brings together suppliers and buyers in a design atmosphere.

placeInfo.headerSubTitle: Exhibition on Engineering Machinery - Machine Tools
placeInfo.Highlights: Concurrent Show On Machine Tools, Automation & Robotics,  Seminars on various topics & one to one business meeting with Indian & International Participants,Promote your brand to more than 15,000+ business visitors,  Seminars on Current Topics related to your business
placeInfo.place: Auto Cluster Exhibition Center, Pune, India
placeInfo.title: Globe-Tech Engineering Expo
placeInfo.description: Globe-Tech Engineering Expo is India's one of the largest SME gatherings on Engineering & Manufacturing products & services. It is an enormous platform to build cooperation between Manufacturers & their target Customers from all Industrial Sectors. GEE aims to promote the Indian Industry on international standard by bringing the manufacturers and end-users on this special forum. It will showcase the entire segment of Engineering Machinery, Machine Tools, Automation & Robotics, Instrumentation & Control, CNC Machines & SPMâ€™s, Material Handling, Hydraulic & Pneumatic and many more. This show presents an unparalleled networking opportunity in the Engineering & Manufacturing Industry.

placeInfo.headerSubTitle: The Final Destination for Entertainment & Music Production Technology
placeInfo.title: PALM Expo
placeInfo.description: PALM Expo is a very elite and the largest musical instruments and accessories' expo in India. PALM Expo will display products sound reinforcement, line array, trussing, rigging, stage sound systems, staging technology, audio networking, audio for video (film & tv), radio production & playout ceiling, speakers stage lighting, lighting control & automation, lasers & effects.

placeInfo.headerSubTitle: Indiaâ€™s only Premier Exhibition for Pharma & Lab Industries at Emerging Markets
placeInfo.Highlights: Meet Industry Leaders from Pharma Formulations, Pharmaceutical & Packaging Machineries      Expo has a clear vision to look beyond Tier-1 cities and start finding new and emerging markets
placeInfo.title: AMPTECH INDIA
placeInfo.description: AMPTECH India is India's only trade fair for emerging pharmaceutical & lab markets. The show will encompass pharmaceutical formulations, pharmaceutical & packaging machinery, lab chemicals, pharmaceuticals, lab & analytical equipment, R&D and all other ancillary industries related such as printing, packaging, logistics, refrigeration, etc. With Uttarakhand State as a focus on pharmaceutical and infrastructure investments, Pharma majors have made their base in Uttarakhand In order to facilitate Pharmaceutical industries in the State, with well-developed infrastructure established at Pharma City Selaqui Industrial Area, Dehradun.

placeInfo.Highlights: A sourcing platform for new products, designs and inspiring ideas ,Boasts an international array of brands and exhibitors,Has earned enormous goodwill over the years due to its commanding presence in the sector
placeInfo.title: Texma Surat
placeInfo.description: Texma Surat will be embraced by the entire textile sector and would see all-round participation from textile types of machinery like Looms, Waterjet, Airjet, Rapier, Texturizing, Knitting,Dyeing, Processing, Printing,Needle Loom and Spare Parts. ..

placeInfo.headerTitle: Hyderabad Jewellery, Pearl and Gem Fair
placeInfo.headerSubTitle: The Key B2B International Jewellery Fair in South India
placeInfo.place: Hyderabad International Convention Centre, Hyderabad, India
placeInfo.title: Hyderabad Jewellery, Pearl and Gem Fair
placeInfo.description: The Hyderabad Jewellery, Pearl and Gem Fair (HJF) is the IndiaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s premium B2B jewellery trade show. exhibits products like fine finished jewellery, gemstones, pearls, diamonds, silver jewellery, machinery and equipment, software and allied products, packaging and display, hallmarks, etc

reviews.name: Banwari lal
reviews.comment: i learnt a lot by the event it was one of my memorable event ever ....

reviews.name: kiran Gopale
reviews.comment: Came to know about the latest product trends and technologies

reviews.name: Mukund P
reviews.comment: It's was a great experience to meet various companies with there product n new technologies for future use . . Nice experience for meðŸ¤—

reviews.name: Siddhi Jain
reviews.comment: It was fun visiting the exhibition..got to see so many new products not only from India but even China n Japan..event was well organised but too big to see all the stalls in a day..I tried to finish it off in a dayâ€™s visit..but ended up tiring myself and skipping a few stalls...anyways it was great.
